sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="app">
    <AppBar app :drawer='drawer' @clicked="toggleDrawer" />
    <NavDrawer app :drawer='drawer' />
    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <router-view />
        <SnackBar />
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
    <v-footer app padless>
      <PageFooter />
    </v-footer>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import AppBar from '@/components/AppBar'
import NavDrawer from '@/components/NavDrawer'
import PageFooter from '@/components/PageFooter'
import SnackBar from '@/components/SnackBar'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    AppBar,
    NavDrawer,
    PageFooter,
    SnackBar,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleDrwaer() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer
    }
  },
  watch: {
    '$props': {
      handler: function (val, oldVal) {
        console.log('watch', val)
      },
      deep: true
    }
  },
};
</script>
